suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Console, account management, client accounts, account owners, add client, client settings, affiliate management, account activation, corporate accounts, account permissions
suggest.meta_description: Discover how Azion Console streamlines management of client and group accounts, enabling simple setup of account owners, client details, and permissions.

current.meta_description: The Azion Console allows you to create separate accounts, called Clients, for each of the affiliates in your group of companies.
